column4: hi there, my usual log in is nerfed, i can't start any applications in it :(
i've created a new login, and that seems to work fine, anyone know how i can fix my normal login?
would really appreciate some help with why i can't start applications on my other user, feeling a bit desperate :(
what application and what is the error
any application and there's no error, they just don't start
give me an example. Open a terminal and type 'gedit' and hit enter, what happens?
not terminal, not firefox, not sessions, i can launch synaptic for some reason, and applications that auto-started are fine so long as i don't shut them down
i'm on a different user login now and this one is fine - on my other login, i can't even open a terminal
however, i have an embedded terminal screenlet that auto-starts, so i can tell you that if i type gedit into that, nothing happens, it just hangs
this happened after you did something or just you were working and it stopped?
i had just configured it to perfection, was happy with it, and decided to install cedega
cedega for some reason also opened fine, i've tried uninstalling it now and that didn't make a difference
are you on your other account right now?
yes
the broken account has xchat on auto-start, so i can come back on that account and still talk if you want to do tests
sudo rm /home/yourbrokenaccount/.Xauthority
there is no file .Xauthority
or anything similar to that
ah yes ... now that I think about it.
http://pastebin.com/d5aacbf80
the same, but with -la
http://pastebin.com/d48cca08a
you there still?
